wikipedia_page.main: Sir Reginald Alfred Hibbert,  (21 February 1922 – 5 October 2002) was a British diplomat.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Mongolia
response: Britain was the first Western country to recognise an independent Mongolia when diplomatic relations were established in January 1963 with appointment of the British Chargé d'Affaires in Peking, Mr Terence Garvey, to Ulaanbaatar as non-resident Ambassador. In 1964 Mr (later Sir) Reginald Hibbert became resident Chargé d'Affaires in Ulaanbaatar. He was succeeded by Mr Heath Mason, who was appointed as the first resident British Ambassador in 1966. In 1968 the Embassy moved to a new building on Peace Avenue where it is still located today.Embassy history, British Embassy Ulaanbaatar (via UK National Archives)
* Sir Reginald Hibbert, , HM Ambassador, Paris.
